text: Bilal Basham Askani (born 7 April 1991) is a Bahraini handball player for Al- Najma and the Bahraini national team.2019 World Men's Handball Championship roster He participated at the 2017 World Men's Handball Championship.2017 World Championship roster ==References== Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Bahraini male handball players Category:Handball players at the 2018 Asian Games Category:Asian Games silver medalists for Bahrain Category:Asian Games medalists in handball Category:Medalists at the 2018 Asian Games
title: Bilal Basham
